patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Security Patch Needed
patch.message:
The site is running 5.33.2. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.33.3 (security) (2021-03-17): Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2021-01 through CIVI-SA-2021-07. (ESR)

upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Upgrade Available
upgrade.message:
5.34.0 was released on 2021-02-03.
5.35.0 was released on 2021-03-03. The latest patch revision is 5.35.1 (2021-03-17).
5.36.0 was released on 2021-04-07.
